function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Population mobility and transport systems as essential elements in the transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to human movement","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in social activities due to travel restrictions","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to improved external air factions for ventilation.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to elevated airflow rates and recirculated indoor air delivery.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial configurations encouraging human interaction may increase virus transmission opportunities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of energy for improving external air factions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-offs between safety and cost in healthcare facility design","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between engineering disciplines","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete literature review may lead to oversight of important factors in building design for disease mitigation","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on different types of buildings and ventilation systems may result in incomplete understanding of their impact on disease transmission","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on contractual issues and project management","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the impacts of covid-19 on the construction sector due to the novel and unexpected nature of the pandemic.","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of availability for in-person interviews may affect the depth and quality of information gathered from interviewees.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative research methods used to study the impacts of covid-19 on construction projects","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergent coding used to identify themes and ideas within the data transcribed from interviews","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Categories of impacts not pre-defined by the research team","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear communication of data analysis results","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrecognized relationships between categorical variables","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inferential misuse of descriptive data analysis methods","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study conducted during first wave of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sample comes from a subset of chilean construction stakeholders","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in impact relationships due to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex relationship among impact categories due to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear cause and effect of impacts on construction projects due to covid-19","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of covid-19 impacts on specific stakeholder categories in the construction industry.","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in impacts among multiple stakeholders","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowed down public administration processes and mobility difficulties caused by the pandemic impact construction projects","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 on construction stakeholders","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective strategies to mitigate the impacts of covid-19 on the construction sector","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Primary data collection through survey tools with close-ended questions","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community transmission control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortcomings of lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of job loss due to lockdown of non-essential organizations","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented use of digital transformation technologies may lead to ineffective response to covid-19","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing and scaling digital transformation technologies for covid-19 response","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of data security and privacy breaches with the use of digital transformation technologies in covid-19 response","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widespread population testing for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented data sources and solutions for covid-19","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited amount of data for forecasting new covid-19 cases","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weekly forecasts of total deaths and hospitalization for the usa","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital contact tracing systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid implementation of virtual clinics in response to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of data sources of existing digital transformation technologies","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of digital transformation technologies without holistic management","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of governmental data including health records poses a risk of privacy breaches and data misuse.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal private data sources raises the risk of data exposure and unauthorized use.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of unauthorized access to private health records due to the use of digital technologies.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of non-compliance with government regulations for transferring and sharing private health data over the internet.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"}]}
